definition: abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
Andrei Sakharov (1921-1989), Russian nuclear scientist and dissident human rights activist
the EU Sakharov Human Rights Prize
pinyin: Sa4 ha3 luo2 fu1 Ren2 quan2 jiang3

definition: Sakharov Prize for Freedom of Thought (awarded by EU since 1988)

sentences.english: Harold said the man should lift his left shoulder and showed him how to do this.
sentences.chinese: 哈罗德告诉那人应该上提左肩，并教他怎么做。

sentences.english: If he is violent, we shall take you away to your aunt's at Harrow .
sentences.chinese: 如果他太激动，我们就把你带到哈罗你姨妈家。

sentences.english: Harold, Molly or Joanne will help with the job.
sentences.chinese: 哈罗德，莫莉或者乔安妮会协助此工作。

sentences.english: In my life, there are thousands of time saying hi and goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 回首一生，数不清有多少次说哈罗和再见。

sentences.english: A new dress caught my eye in Harrod's window.
sentences.chinese: 哈罗德橱窗内的一件新衣引起了我人注意。

sentences.english: 1066 – Harold Godwinson is crowned King of England.
sentences.chinese: 1066年的今天，哈罗德二世加冕成为英格兰国王。
哈罗，东方贷款有限公司。

sentences.english: Harold is always brown-nosing the boss.
sentences.chinese: 哈罗德老是拍老板的马屁。

sentences.english: In fact I would say hello to horses and cows too just because I was lonely.
sentences.chinese: 事实上在那里我对牛和马也说哈罗，因为我太孤独了。

sentences.english: Mrs. Knighton thought that Isabel had hurled herself away on Harold.
sentences.chinese: 奈顿夫人认为，伊莎贝尔嫁给哈罗德是糟塌了自己。

sentences.english: Harrod's in London accepts pounds, euros, and dollars.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦的哈罗德百货公司接受英镑，欧元还有美元。

sentences.english: "Hello," he said, smiling like a young heartthrob from a Disney movie.
sentences.chinese: “哈罗”他说，笑得就像迪斯尼动画片里的小万人迷。

sentences.english: “We’ll have to try again, Harold, ” Maude said.
sentences.chinese: 哈罗德，我们必须再试一次。

sentences.english: The other room-mate, harold goy, was a good soul, no older than a child.
sentences.chinese: 另外那个同屋子的哈罗德盖伊，是个心地纯良的孩子。

definition: Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
Delhi/New Delhi, capital of India/same as 新德里[Xin1 De2 li3]
Acre, city in Israel, also known as Akko
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
abbr. for the Philippines 菲律賓|菲律宾[Fei1 lu:4 bin1]
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
